label: current
subject: Hello
body:
p Hello #{fullname}
p You last logged into PINGR on #{last_login}, so we thought we'd let you know how #{practiceName} is doing. Remember, you can log directly into #[a(href='#{pingrUrl}') PINGR] for more detail, including:
ul
  li Lists of patients not achieving each quality indicator
  li Suggested improvement actions for these patients, and for #{practiceName} in general
  li Comparison of your performance with other practices in Salford
ul
p #{practiceName}'s current performance is:
table
  thead(style='font-weight:bold')
    tr(style='font-weight:bold')
      th Indicator
      th Current Performance
      th Number of Patients
      th Target
      th Salford Benchmark
  tbody
    for indicator in indicators
      tr
        td= indicator.name
        td= indicator.performance
        td= indicator.fraction
        td= indicator.target
        td= indicator.benchmark
p We only send you emails if you haven't visited PINGR for two weeks. If you wish to stop receiving them please visit #[a(href='#{pingrUrl}') PINGR] and update your email preferences.
p The PINGR team
p
  strong Tip: 
  | If youâ€™re having trouble accessing PINGR: open Google Chrome, copy PINGR's address (#{pingrUrl}) and paste it into the address bar at the top. If you're still having problems accessing PINGR, please email benjamin.brown@manchester.ac.uk for help.

label: patient focused
subject: 5 of your patients not meeting NICE guidelines
body:
p Hi #{fullname}
p 
  a(href='#{pingrUrl}') PINGR
  |  has identified 5 of 
  strong(style="font-style:italic") your 
  | patients not meeting 
  strong 3 or more 
  | NICE quality standards. Here are their NHS numbers:
table
  tbody
    for patient in patients.slice(0,5)
      tr
        td
          a(href='#{pingrUrl}#patient/#{patient._id}')= patient.nhsNumber
p
  | Log into PINGR 
  a(href='#{pingrUrl}#patient') now 
  | to treat 
  strong(style="font-style:italic") your 
  | patients.
p(style="margin-bottom:2px")
  strong Short on time?
ol(style="Margin-top:0px;")
  li(style="Margin-top: 0;") Forward this email to a member of your team for them to action (e.g. a nurse or GP).
  li Forward this email to your secretary or practice manager; ask them to book a slot in your calendar to look at PINGR.
  li Schedule a slot in your calendar yourself to look at PINGR.
p(style="margin-bottom:2px") Best wishes,
p(style="margin-top:4px") Dr Benjamin Brown
p(style="margin-bottom:2px")
  strong Problems? 
p(style="margin-top:2px")
  | To access PINGR copy this address (
  a(href="#{pingrUrl}") #{pingrUrlWithoutTracking} 
  | ) into your web browser. You can change your email settings 
  a(href="#{pingrUrl}emailpreference") here
  | . For further help email 
  a(href="mailto:#{reminderEmailsFrom}") #{reminderEmailsFrom}
  | .
